overview: Wanting to grow up, Magdalena (17) meets 10 year older Peter. She falls in love, while Peter hides his true face. To pay off his debts to Divna, landlady of a striptease  club, through manipulation and false love he drags Magdalena into a vicious drug dealing chain, the same way he was dragged when he was just a kid in love.  Magdalena, aware that she has become his slave, manages to get stronger and reports him to the police.  That night, the violence will be stopped by a sudden guest in the police service.
title: Chain
